name: remix-bvg-map-frontend
description: A website that allows you to remix the BVG transit map.
author: Jannis R <mail@jannisr.de>

scripts.build:dev: env NODE_ENV=dev browserify --debug -g envify -t sheetify -p [ css-extract -o dist/bundle.css ] index.js > dist/bundle.js
scripts.build: env NODE_ENV=production browserify -p common-shakeify -g [babelify --presets env --ignore '/node_modules\/virtual-dom/'] -t sheetify/transform -p [ css-extract -o dist/bundle.css ] -g envify -g uglifyify index.js | uglifyjs -mc > dist/bundle.js
